org.osgeo.mapguide

Class MgMapPlot

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.osgeo.mapguide.MgObject
      • org.osgeo.mapguide.MgDisposable
        • org.osgeo.mapguide.MgGuardDisposable
          • org.osgeo.mapguide.MgSerializable
            • org.osgeo.mapguide.MgNamedSerializable
              • org.osgeo.mapguide.MgMapPlot

  • public class MgMapPlot
extends MgNamedSerializable
    The MgMapPlot class allows the developer to specify the map, the view of the map, the plot specification, and the layout for one sheet within a call to GenerateMultiPlot.

      • Fields inherited from class org.osgeo.mapguide.MgObject
